Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Imi vanotenda! Musasiye hupfumi hwenyu nevana venyu zvichikutendeudzai kubva munzira yekurangarira Allah. Uye uyo anoita izvozvo, zvino ndivo vakarasikirwa

Uye shandisai (kupa zvipo) kubva mune izvo zvatakakupai rufu rwusati rwasvikira umwe wenyu, kuti azoti: â€œTenzi wangu! Dai mandipa mukana, kwekanguva kadiki, kuti ndipe Swadaqah (chipo) uye ndive uyo weavo vanoita zvakanaka (Hajj nemamwe mabasa akanaka)
Uye Allah havambopi mukana wekanguva kune munhu kana nguva yake (yekufa) yakwana. Uye Allah vanoziva zvose zvamunoita
